detail_desc: Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, satin ribbons that tie at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Knee-length, printed swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Joggers in sturdy twill containing some wool with an elasticated waist, slightly lower crotch and side pockets. Tapered legs with flap pockets and ribbed hems.

Twill suit trousers containing some wool with a regular waist and pleats at the top. Extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with turn-ups. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Twill suit trousers containing some wool with a regular waist and pleats at the top. Extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with turn-ups. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut top in woven fabric with a slight sheen, V-neck and spaghetti straps.
Straight-cut top in woven fabric with a slight sheen, V-neck and spaghetti straps.

Tuxedo trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with satin stripes down the sides and creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Knee-length lace dress with mesh sections at the top and on the sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a seam at the waist. Half-lined.
T-shirt in printed jersey.

Shirt in fil à fil cotton with a button-down collar and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in fil à fil cotton with a button-down collar and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in fil à fil cotton with a button-down collar and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short off-the-shoulder top in a textured chiffon weave with narrow elastication and double flounces at the top. Narrow, decorative shoulder straps and short flounced sleeves.
Short off-the-shoulder top in a textured chiffon weave with narrow elastication and double flounces at the top. Narrow, decorative shoulder straps and short flounced sleeves.
Strapless satin dress with draping at the bust and a cut-out section and wide, horizontal elasticated strap at the back. Hook and eye fasteners and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Knee-length satin dress with flounce details, a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and a zip in the side. Unlined.
Knee-length satin dress with flounce details, a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and a zip in the side. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a frill and narrow shoulder straps, one with a sewn-on metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a frill and narrow shoulder straps, one with a sewn-on metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a frill and narrow shoulder straps, one with a sewn-on metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a frill and narrow shoulder straps, one with a sewn-on metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms.
Vest top in printed jersey.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and mesh with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and mesh with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Imitation leather hi-tops with lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft modal and cotton knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft modal and cotton knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft merino wool blend with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Fine-knit jumper in a soft merino wool blend with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved knitted jumper in a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a slit in the sides.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and adjustable tabs and buttons at the sides.
Fitted short-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Fitted short-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Fitted short-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Ankle-length trousers in a jacquard-weave viscose blend with a high waist and wide, detachable belt. Concealed zip in the side, side pockets and slightly shorter, tapered legs with creases.

Parka in cotton twill with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood, shoulder tabs with a press-stud, and zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with concealed press-studs, a drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Parka in cotton twill with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood, shoulder tabs with a press-stud, and zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with concealed press-studs, a drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Padded jacket with a padded hood with a faux fur trim, and a stand-up collar. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, zipped front pockets and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Short coat in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, zip and wind flap at the front and front pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a lace yoke at the front. Narrow, rounded collar with a sewn-on satin tie and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a lace yoke at the front. Narrow, rounded collar with a sewn-on satin tie and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.

Running jacket in windproof, functional fabric with a hood, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and concealed front pockets with a zip. Long raglan sleeves with ventilating mesh sections and a partially loose yoke at the back. Reflective details. Unlined.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric and a lined hood. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and sides. Partly lined.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric and a lined hood. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and sides. Partly lined.

Padded, gently tailored gilet with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, reflective details and ribbed hems.
Jersey top with a lace yoke and short sleeves with a double frill.
